attributes.action: Direct all nhs establishments to remove car parking fees for patients, visitors and staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The fact that England is now the only country in the UK to charge for parking by nhs trusts is disgusting. it as the equivilant of charging patients for treatment, penalising those who have to visit patients and taking hard earned money from staff.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
